text: The following is a list of deaths that should be noted in 2021. For deaths in each month, please see "Months". Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. ==Months== * January * February * March * April * May * June * July * August * September * October * November * December ==Related pages== * List of deaths due to COVID-19 * 2021 in association football deaths * Deaths in 2015 * Deaths in 2016 * Deaths in 2017 * Deaths in 2018 * Deaths in 2019 * Deaths in 2020 * Deaths in 2022 * Deaths in 2023 * Deaths in 2024 ==Other websites== *The Guardian, UK obituaries *The Telegraph obituaries *Obituaries, Chicago Tribune *Obituaries, Los Angeles Times *The New York Times, US obituaries *The Washington Post obituaries *The Sydney Morning Herald, Australian obituaries Category:2021 deaths
title: Deaths in 2021
